meanings.definition: Having keen eyesight or sharp vision.
meanings.sent1: The hawkeyed detective spotted the clue from far away.
meanings.sent2: The hawkeyed hawk could see its prey from high above.
meanings.sent3: The hawkeyed owl noticed the sneaky mouse trying to steal its food.
meanings.sent4: Her hawkeyed focus on the details uncovered the hidden truth.
meanings.sent5: The hawkeyed archer never missed a target in the competition.

meanings.sent1: The hawkeyed security guard noticed the suspicious behavior.
meanings.sent2: The hawkeyed lifeguard kept a close watch on the swimmers.
meanings.sent3: The hawkeyed cat stared intently at the moving toy.
meanings.sent4: Her hawkeyed awareness prevented any surprises.
meanings.sent5: The hawkeyed sentinel stood guard through the night.

meanings.sent1: The hawkeyed student caught every detail in the lecture.
meanings.sent2: The hawkeyed journalist noticed the small inconsistencies in the story.
meanings.sent3: The hawkeyed toddler spotted the hidden toy under the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her hawkeyed focus on the task ensured no mistakes were made.
meanings.sent5: The hawkeyed explorer discovered the rare flower in the dense forest.
